title: Dangers Facing Female Uber, Lyft Drivers
description:
For many women drivers behind the wheel for Uber or Lyft, the flexible hours and the ability to juggle childcare has been a dream come true. But as Bloomberg's Selina Wang tells David Meyers, some drivers are now coming forward and detailing the nightmares they face of frequent encounters of harassment and assault.
FOLLOW UP

You can follow Selina at: @Selina_y_wang
